trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange"></xref>事件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The event model in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] is based on having an event delegate that connects an event with its handler.
trans-unit.target: 中的事件模型[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基于具有与其处理程序连接事件的事件委托。

trans-unit.source: To raise a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event, two elements are needed: - The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class, derived from <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>, which holds the event data.
trans-unit.target: 若要引发<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>事件，需要两个元素:-<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>类，派生自<xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName>，其中包含事件数据。</xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: - The DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, which points to a method that provides the response to the event.
trans-unit.target: -DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler 委托，用于指向提供对事件作出响应的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
